altTitles.th: ไปต่างโลก! ก็ต้องไปกับสมาร์ทโฟนสิ!!!

altTitles.vi: Xuyên Không Cùng Với Chiếc Smartphone
Sang Thế Giới Khác Cùng Với Chiếc Smartphone
Đến thế giới mới với smartphone!

description.en: After a freak accident involving some lightning winds up zapping him dead, 15-year-old Mochizuki Touya wakes up to find himself face-to-face with God. "I am afraid to say that I have made a bit of a blunder" laments the old coot. But all is not lost! God says that he can reincarnate Touya into a world of fantasy, and as a bonus, he gets to bring his smartphone along with! So begins Touya's adventure in a new, anachronistic pseudo-medieval world. Friends! Laughs! Tears! Inexplicable Deus ex Machina! He sets off on a journey full of wonder as he absentmindedly travels from place to place, following whatever goal catches his fancy. The curtains lift on an epic tale of swords, sorcery, and smartphone apps!
description.ja: 神様のうっかりによって死んでしまった主人公は、スマートフォンとともに中世ヨーロッパ風異世界に転生してしまい……？ゆるゆる異世界珍道中、さて、のんびり参りましょう。
description.vi:
Mochizuki Touya, 15 tuổi là main giống như bao anh main khác khi đang trên đường về nhà lại bị… sét đánh lăn đùng ra chết :v.Điều đáng nói ở đây là sau khi chết anh main lại bị triệu tập đến trước mặt Thượng đế với lý do: Ổng vô tình… hại chết anh main mà không hay biết. Và để đền bù thì ảnh đã được hồi sinh sang một thế giới song song khác với 1 cái Sì mát phôn (Smartphone :v).
Thừa hưởng trong mình một di sản to lớn về những nền văn minh cổ đại, anh thong dong đi trên con đường đơn độc tại một thế giới khác trong khi sở hữu một nguồn sức mạnh thậm chí có thể giúp anh làm bá chủ của cả thế giới thời bấy giờ.
Càng đi anh càng tạo thêm cho mình nhiều đồng chí quan trọng và trước khi kịp nhận ra… anh đã ngày càng lún sâu vào những bí mật được cất giấu tại thế giới đó…
description.pt-br: Touya Mochizuki foi acidentalmente morto e, como uma desculpa, Deus lhe permite renascer em um mundo de fantasia e lhe concederá qualquer coisa que ele desejar. E assim, Touya escolhe manter seu smartphone no próximo mundo. Em sua segunda chance na vida, ele faz amizade com muitas figuras importantes e se depara com o segredo do mundo. Ele herda o legado de uma civilização antiga e viaja despreocupadamente enquanto possui poderes que rivalizam com os reis daquele mundo.

description.en:
Shikimori and Izumi are high school sweethearts. They hold hands walking home from school, they flirt in the halls, they tease each other. But Shikimori knows what she wants, and how to get it, and she can turn from cutie to cool in an instant!

---

- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10025/episode/343330) (U.S. Only), [Manga Planet](https://mangaplanet.com/comic/6476b52737c08)
description.es: La vida cotidiana de un muchacho con mala suerte y su asombrosa y a veces intimidante novia.
description.fr: La vie quotidienne d'un petit ami passif et sa petite amie incroyable et quelque fois intimidante.
description.pt-br: A vida diária de um namorado azarado e sua incrível e as vezes intimidadora namorada.

altTitles.ja: 訳アリ心霊マンション

altTitles.vi: Chào Mừng Đến Với Chung Cư Ma Ám

description.en: Kaoru Shinonome, who had been living as a freelancer, invests her inheritance in property and buys a vast old condominium. Her dream life as a wealthy landlord is about to begin—but there are no living tenants, only spirits, and her new property is a rollercoaster ride of psychic phenomena. Kaoru embraces her new specter-filled life as the owner of Ghost Mansion and starts recruiting for new non-living residents!

title.en: Boku no Kanojo ga Majime Sugiru Shojo Bitch na Ken

altTitles.en: My Girlfriend is a Virgin Who Takes Being Slutty Too Seriously

altTitles.ko-ro: Nae yeojachinguga seongsil jinamyeon cheonyeo bischiin geon

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku no Kanojo ga Majime Sugiru Shojo Bitch na Ken

description.en: When high school student Shinozaki confesses his feelings to the beautiful and aloof class representative, Akiho Kosaka, the last thing he expected was for her to say "yes." Like everything else in her diligent life, Kosaka takes dating quite seriously. In an effort to be a good girlfriend, Kosaka decides to meticulously study (and bluntly suggest) all manner of ways to keep Shinozaki sexually satisfied in the theoretical sense, that is. This innocently lewd relationship is only just the beginning.
description.fr: Après que Shinozaki Haruka se soit déclaré à la déléguée, Kousaka Akiho, il se rend compte que cette élève modèle en apparence risque d’être plus compliquée à gérer qu’il ne l’aurait pensé!
description.ja: 「では、手始めに“性交渉”の予定日を決めましょうか。」憧れのクラスメイトに告白した篠崎は、意外にもOKの返事をもらう。だが、彼女は予想外のズレっぷりを発揮する処女ビッチで…!?
description.pt: Depois que o Shinozaki Haruka se confessou para a Representante de Classe, Kousaka Akiho, ele começa à compreender que aquela representante perfeita pode ser um pouco difícil de se lidar!
description.ru: После того, как Шинодзаки Харука признается в любви Косаке Акихо, (спортсменке, красавице и просто старосте класса), которую он просто боготворил, та сразу же соглашается с ним встречаться. Вот только Харука не ожидал узнать кое-что, что изрядно покоробило его представления о своем кумире…

altTitles.ja: 葬送のフリーレン

altTitles.th: คำอธิษฐานในวันที่จากลา Frieren

altTitles.el: Φρίρεν: Πέρα από το Τέλος του Ταξιδιού

altTitles.de: Frieren: Nach dem Ende der Reise

altTitles.es-la: Frieren: Más allá del fin del viaje

description.el: Έχοντας νικήσει τον βασιλιά των δαιμόνων, το ταξίδι μιας δεκαετίας φτάνει στο τέλος του και μια νέα εποχή ειρήνης ξεκινά. Η ζωή όμως συνεχίζεται, ειδικά για την Φρίρεν, πως ως ξωτικό έχει ακόμα αιώνες ζωής μπροστά της. Με τις δεκαετίες να περνάνε, η Φρίρεν έρχεται αντιμέτωπη με την μεταβλητότητα του κόσμου και την παροδικότητα των ανθρώπων. Μετά από μια τελευταία συνάντηση με όλη την παλιά της ομάδα, συνειδητοποιεί ότι ο χρόνος που πέρασε με τους φίλους της ήταν υπερβολικά σύντομος και ότι δεν θα έχει ποτέ την ευκαιρία να τους μάθει καλύτερα. Έρχοντας αντιμέτωπη με την αλήθεια αυτή, η Φρίρεν αποφασίζει να ξεκινήσει ένα ακόμα ταξίδι αλλά αυτή τη φορά έχοντας σκοπό να μάθει το τι σημαίνει να είσαι άνθρωπος.
description.en: The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. With the great struggle over, they all go their separate ways to live a quiet life. But as an elf, Frieren, nearly immortal, will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to terms with the mortality of her friends? How can she find fulfillment in her own life, and can she learn to understand what life means to the humans around her? Frieren begins a new journey to find the answer.
description.es: Frieren es una elfa, y como para todos los de su raza, los años pasan en un suspiro… pero no es así para sus antiguos compañeros de batalla, a los que Frieren verá morir y envejecer. De repente Frieren se da cuenta de que pese a que la vida avanza a un ritmo más lento para ella, las experiencias con sus seres queridos se le escapan de las manos. Un aire nostálgico envuelve a este manga fantástico tan entrañable que ha vendido ya más de 2,5 millones de copias en Japón.
description.fr:
Que deviennent les héros une fois le mal vaincu ?
Dans ce coffret collector : un jeu de 54 cartes entièrement personnalisé aux couleurs de la série et le manga avec une jaquette alternative réversible !

Alors que Frieren et ses compagnons font halte dans la citadelle de Heiß, Stark propose à Fern d'aller en rendez-vous, sur le ton de la plaisanterie... et contre toute attente, la jeune fille accepte ! Sur les conseils de l'elfe, qui n'y connaît pas grand-chose, le guerrier emmène donc son amie faire le tour de la ville, ce qui leur permet de se rapprocher un peu.

Après cette pause bienvenue, les trois aventuriers repartent sur les routes et arrivent au haut-plateau du Nord, une zone extrêmement dangereuse où pullulent aussi bien des monstres coriaces que des démons retors... Parviendront-ils à survivre dans cette région hostile ?
description.es-la: Tras cumplir su misión de derrotar al Rey Demonio, la maga elfo Frieren, el héroe Himmel, el sacerdote Heiter y el guerrero Eisen regresan a casa después de un viaje de una década donde disolverán su grupo y tomarán sus propios caminos. Pero el tiempo pasa de forma distinta para los elfos, Frieren comienza a ser testigo de como sus excompañeros sufren sus estragos y comienzan a morir lentamente y uno a uno. Antes de fallecer, Heiter el sacerdote, le impone a Frieren un aprendiz humana llamada Fern. Llevados por la afición que tiene la alfa por recolectar hechizos mágicos, ambos emprenderán una aventura, llena de magia e introspección, que los llevará a revisitar lugares que había conocido en su anterior travesía, mientras enfrenta el pesar que le causa descubrir todas las posibilidades que ha desperdiciado en su viaje que le hubiesen posibilitado entablar una relación más cercana con sus compañeros ahora fallecidos.
description.zh-hk: 在打倒了魔王的勇者一行人当中，魔法使芙莉莲是精灵，她和其他三人有不一样的地方。 生活在“之后”的世界里，她感受到了什么—— 留下来的人们所编织的葬送与祈祷又意味着什么—— 故事从“冒险的结束”开始。 这是讲述英雄们的活法的，后日谈奇幻作品！

altTitles.ja: 打撃系鬼っ娘が征く配信道！@COMIC

altTitles.en: Blunt Type Ogre Girl’s Way to Live Streaming

description.en: Futayado Nanako(二宿菜々香) calling herself a part time warrior, though all the places she worked at got bankrupt, now has too much time on her hands. And to that opportunity, she was invited by a very close friend of hers, a pro gamer and a live streamer, and decided to do the world’s first VRMMO with a live stream function 《WorldLive-ONLINE》. And so, a real cheat girl who has extraordinary strength (21 yrs old) carries a blunt weapon and rampages through the VR world, a bludgeoning refreshing story where the viewers tremble in fear!
description.ja:
バイト先が全て潰れてしまった少女は、親友のプロゲーマーに誘われて、「スクナ」として配信者になることに！
選んだゲームは広大な自然広がるファンタジーの世界なのに、勧められたのは物理特化の「鬼人族」に打撃武器!?
だが超人級の身体能力をもつ彼女にはドンピシャリ。軽々と使いこなし、生き生きと敵をなぎ倒す！
普段のゆるい雰囲気とは裏腹なその姿に、気づけばリスナーは一万人越え!?
噂を聞きつけやってくる強敵も、金棒一本に全ての力を込めて迎え撃つ――

「それじゃあ、今日も配信やっていこ～」

解き放たれた鬼っ娘がモンスターを狩りまくる、冒険配信ファンタジー開幕！

altTitles.en: (例大祭11) まるまる針妙丸 (東方Project)

description.en: Gensokyo residents are gushing over newest cast member, because every good franchise needs a micromacrophilia fetish fuel.

[Welcome to the Possession of Lee Joo Eun! ^0^]

Out of nowhere, a status window appeared, and I found myself possessed.
In an internet novel where the top-ranked female lead in the world pretends to be an outcast at school!
And in this story...

“Hey, are you ignoring me right now? Do you think we’re a joke?”

I’m playing the role of one of the henchmen for the villainess who bullies the heroine.

Before I get beaten up by the female lead, who reveals her true identity, and end up with eight weeks of recovery,
there’s only one way to escape this absurd world and role.

[If you create a happy ending, I’ll grant you a wish! >ㅁ<]

I need to bring happiness to all the characters in this story and make a wish. But...

“Are you the leader of this school? Heh, our focus wants to have a word with you.”
“What if I refuse?”
“Eek! Oh my gosh, are we really going to fight Haeseong High today?!”

...Can I really bring happiness to these characters?
This place truly is an era of madness.
description.ko:
[이주은 님의 빙의를 환영합니다. ^0^]

난데없이 등장한 상태창과 함께 빙의해 버리고 말았다.
그것도 세계 서열 0위의 여주가 왕따 분장을 하고 학교에 다니는 인터넷 소설에!
그리고 나는 이 이야기에서,

“야, 너 지금 내 말 무시하는 거야? 우리가 우스워?”

여주를 괴롭히는 악녀……의 부하3을 담당하고 있다.

본모습을 드러낸 여주에게 맞아 전치 8주의 부상을 입기 전에
이 말도 안 되는 세계와 역할에서 벗어나는 방법은 오직 하나.

[해피 엔딩을 만들어 주시면 소원을 들어 드릴게요! >ㅁ
인소 속 모든 등장인물들에게 행복한 결말을 안겨 주고 소원을 비는 것. 그런데…….

“네가 이 학교 대가리냐? 쿡, 우리 포커스가 너 좀 보자신다.”
“싫다면?”
“꺅! 챠나 챠나, 오늘 우리 해성상고랑 싸우는 거야?!”

……내가 과연 이 캐릭터들을 행복하게 해 줄 수 있을까?
이곳은, 그야말로 광기의 시대였다.

altTitles.ja: ラフ

description.en: Yamato Keisuke, a promising freestyle swimmer, and Ninomiya Ami, a talented diver, are the offsprings of two rival families owners of confectionery shops. Two generations ago, Grandfather Ninomiya came up with an idea for an owl-shaped cake, but Grandfather Yamato quickly raised to the challenge and thought of a similar cake–but in Yamato's the owl had ears. Because they're priced the same, Yamato's extra ears were crucial, and that made the business of the Ninomiya confectionery suffer. Grandfather Ninomiya then fell ill worrying about his shop. Before his death, his last words were "I was killed by the Yamatos", and since that moment the two families have been sworn rivals.

Due to childhood trauma, Kong Suah, a freshman majoring in creative writing, has difficulty expressing emotions.

She dreams of becoming a novelist, but her dreams, and her relationships are often hindered by those pesky emotions!

Then one day, into Suah’s quiet world drops a senior from the physical education department.

Wait, what’s wrong with this guy? Why does this big guy keep crying?

A growth drama that starts at ground zero, featuring a woman who is emotionally insensitive and a man who is emotionally sensitive!
description.ko:
어렸을 때의 트라우마로 감정 표현이 어려운 문창과 새내기 공수아.
소설가를 꿈꾸고 있지만 꿈도 인간관계도 감정이란 놈한테 발목 잡히기 일쑤!
그러던 어느 날, 수아의 고요한 세계에 체대생 선배님이 뚝 하고 떨어지는데,
이 선배님 뭔가 이상하다? 덩치는 산만한 사람이 왜 자꾸 우는 거지?
감정이 둔감한 여자와 감정이 예민한 남자의 0단계부터 시작하는 성장 드라마!

altTitles.ja: フルメタル・パニック!

description.en: Trouble always seems to follow the beautiful and sassy, Kaname Chidori. Though she is only a high-school student, Kaname is constantly the target of terrorism. Lucky for her though, the dreamy Sosuke, an undercover agent from Mithril, is one step behind her, ready to protect her at any cost. But will he be able to save her from harm every time she is in trouble?
description.es-la: Los problemas siempre parecen perseguir a la bella y atrevida Kaname Chidori. Aunque solo es una estudiante de preparatoria, Kaname es constantemente el blanco del terrorismo. Sin embargo, por suerte para ella, el soñador Sosuke, un agente encubierto de Mithril, está un paso detrás de ella, listo para protegerla a cualquier costo. Pero, ¿podrá salvarla del daño cada vez que esté en problemas?

title.en: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.ja: クラスで２番目に可愛い女の子と友だちになった

altTitles.en: I Became Friends with the Second Cutest Girl in My Class

altTitles.ja-ro: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.id: Aku Berteman dengan Gadis Paling Cantik Kedua di Kelas ku

altTitles.it: Sono diventato amico con la seconda ragazza più carina nella mia classe

description.en:
I, Maehara Maki, someone who couldn’t make any acquaintances or friends in high school, finally had someone I can hang out with outside of school. A girl.

Her name was Asanagi-san. The boys in my class called her ‘The class’ second cutest girl’ behind her back.

On Fridays, she would refuse her best friend, Amami, ‘the cutest girl in class’ invitation just to hang out in my house with me.

Together, we played games, watched some movies, read some manga while eating junk foods like pizza and hamburgers, and chugging cola without a care in the world. To others, we may seem sloppy, but it was a precious, secret time together for Asanagi-san and myself.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/59139)
description.id:
Aku, Maehara Maki, seseorang yang tidak memiliki kenalan atau teman di SMA, akhirnya memiliki seseorang yang bisa aku ajak bergaul di luar sekolah. Seorang gadis.

Namanya Asanagi-san. Anak-anak laki-laki di kelas saya memanggilnya 'Gadis paling imut kedua di kelas' di belakangnya.

Pada hari Jumat, dia akan menolak ajakan sahabatnya, Amami, 'gadis paling manis di kelas' hanya untuk berkumpul di rumah ku dengan ku.

Bersama-sama, kami bermain game, menonton film, membaca manga sambil makan junk food seperti pizza dan hamburger, dan menenggak cola tanpa peduli dengan dunia. Bagi orang lain, kami mungkin terlihat ceroboh, tetapi itu adalah waktu yang berharga, waktu rahasia bersama untuk Asanagi-san dan ku sendiri.
description.es-la: Yo, Maehara Maki, alguien que no podía conocer ni hacer amigos en la escuela secundaria, finalmente tenía a alguien con quien podía pasar el rato fuera de la escuela. Una mujer. Su nombre era Asanagi-san. Los chicos de mi clase la llamaban "La segunda chica más linda de la clase'" a sus espaldas. Los viernes, rechazaba la invitación de su mejor amiga, Amami, "la chica más linda de la clase" solo para pasar el rato en mi casa conmigo. Juntos, jugamos, vimos algunas películas, leímos manga mientras comíamos comida chatarra como pizza y hamburguesas, y tomábamos refrescos de cola sin preocuparnos por nada. Para otros, podemos parecer descuidados, pero fue un tiempo secreto y precioso para Asanagi-san y para mí.
description.pt-br:
Eu, Maehara Maki, alguém que não conseguia conhecer ou fazer amigos no ensino médio, finalmente consegui alguém com quem eu pudesse sair fora da escola. Uma garota.

O nome dela era Asanagi-san. Os meninos da minha turma a chamavam de 'a segunda garota mais fofa da turma' pelas costas.

Às sextas-feiras, ela recusava o convite de sua melhor amiga, Amami, 'a garota mais fofa da classe' só para ficar na minha casa comigo.

Juntos, jogamos, assistimos a alguns filmes, lemos alguns mangás enquanto comíamos junk food como pizza e hambúrgueres e bebíamos refrigerantes sem nenhuma preocupação no mundo. Para outros, podemos parecer desleixados, mas foi um tempo precioso e secreto juntos para Asanagi-san e eu.

title.en: I Was Locked Up by the Mad Dog I Raised

altTitles.en: I Was Held in Captivity by the Crazy Dog I Raised
I Was Imprisoned by My Own Mad Dog
I Was Imprisoned by the Crazy Dog I Raised
I Was Locked Up by the Crazy Dog I Raised
I'm Imprisoned by the Mad Dog I Raised

description.en:
Elizabeth found herself reincarnated as the deceased first love of Ernst, the male protagonist of a 19+ dark novel. And to make matters worse, she ends up with the fate of an extra who doesn't even appear in the original story, dying at the hands of the traitor Karsis on her wedding day.

She tried to stop the rebellion to survive, but the scale of the mess the original owner of her body had caused was just too big. Not only had she had an inappropriate relationship with her loyal servant Karsis, but she had also wronged him terribly. Feeling guilty, she tried to set him free, but...

"That won't do. Betrayal, that is. If you throw away a dog that was already abandoned once, this time it might bite its master."

With half-crazed eyes, he was trying to kill me...? Wait, hold on. Ka-Karsis!
description.ko:
19금 피폐 소설 속 남자 주인공 '에른스트'의 죽은 첫사랑으로 빙의한 '엘리자베스'. 그것도 결혼식 날, 반역자 '카르시스'의 손에 절명해 원작엔 등장하지도 못하는 엑스트라의 운명으로.

어떻게든 살아남기 위해 반역을 막아 보려 했지만, 아무래도 원래 몸 주인이 친 사고의 스케일이 너무 크다. 자신의 충직한 개 '카르시스'와 부적절한 관계였던 걸로 모자라, 그에게 몹쓸 짓을 저지르기까지?! 죄책감에 그를 자유롭게 풀어 주고자 했지만...

"안 되죠. 배신은. 이미 버려졌던 개를 또 버리면. 이번엔 주인을 물지도 몰라."

반쯤 맛이 간 눈으로 나를 죽이려고 하는데...? 아니, 잠깐. 카, 카르시스!

altTitles.ja: イナズマイレブン

description.en:
Raimon Middle School 's soccer club captain, Endou Mamoru is in a pinch - his club is about to be destroyed! Literally! To avert the wrecking ball and disbanding of the club, his team must win against the toughest soccer team in the area - Teikoku. Will Endou and his team meet a crushing defeat or will a mysterious transfer student with a fiery kick save them from disaster?!  
  
Won the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for Best Children's Manga.

altTitles.ja: サクラ大戦 漫画版第二部

description.en: With the Hive of Darkness and High Priest Tenkai defeated, peace has returned to the capital thanks to the Imperial Combat Troupe. But a new enemy has risen and threatens to disturb this new year of peace! The curtain is rising, the bells are ringing and a new battle is about to begin, for the Kouma have been resurrected by their new King: AOI SATAN
description.ja: 黒之巣会との死闘に勝利し平和を取り戻した帝都・東京。だが、新年を祝う花組の眼前に降魔の群れが舞い降りる。地の底から甦った魔族。それを従えし男の名は、葵叉丹!!

title.en: I Turned off the Pain Perception Setting!

altTitles.en: I Said I Turned off the Pain Perception Setting!
I'm Telling You, I Already Turned off the Pain Perception Setting!
You Turned off the Pain Setting?
I Turned off the Pain Setting?

altTitles.ja: 100回目プレイヤーなので高好感度はエンリョします！

altTitles.es-la: ¿Se me ha olvidado desactivar la configuración del dolor?

description.en:
**Pain perception 0, capture rate is 100!**

A virtual reality game with pain perception set to '0'. I was the first to clear all endings, and started the final 100th playthrough... but something is off. Suddenly, I have a strange disease with a terminal setting, and the capture target characters are starting to worry about me.

"I don't feel any pain, so should I pretend to be sick?"

Before I knew it, to the capture target characters, I became a noble hero enduring pain and sacrificing for world peace. Since it has come to this, the concept for this playthrough is a terminally-ill hero throwing herself for the world! I must end it with a happy ending. This is my last playthrough in my life!
description.mn:
Өвдөлтийн мэдрэмж 0, Барих хувь 100!
Виртуал ертөнцийн тоглоомны өвдөлтийн мэдрэмжийн тохиргоог "0" болгосон. Би бүх төгсгөлийг нь дуусгасан цор ганц, тиймээс энэ бол миний 100 дахь оролдлого...гэхдээ сонин байна. Гэнэтхэн, эмчлэгдхээргүй өвчинтэй, бас гол дүрүүд миний төлөө санаа зовж эхэлсэн.
"Би ямар ч өвдөлт мэдрэхгүй болохоор, дүр эсгэх нь зөв юм болов уу?"
Намайг мэдхээс өмнө, энэ гол дүрүүдэд би энэ дэлхийн амар амгалангийн төлөө өөрийгөө золиослох баатар болчихсон байсан. Одоо өнгөрснөөс хойш, энэ оролдлогын концепц бол энэ ертөнцийн төлөө өөрийгөө золиослох! Би заавал аз жаргалтай төгсөх хэрэгтэй. Энэ бол миний сүүлчийн оролдлого!

title.en: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi

altTitles.ja: これからだんだん幸せになっていく怖い 女上司

altTitles.ar: رئيسة مرعبة تزداد سعادة وسعادة من الآن فصاعدًا

altTitles.ja-ro: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi
Korekara Dondon Shiawase ni Natte iku Kowai Jōshi

altTitles.en: A Scary Boss, But From Now on She's Going to Be Happier and Happier

altTitles.es-la: Una jefa que da miedo, pero a partir de ahora va a ser cada vez más feliz.

description.ar: مديرتي مخيفة للغايه، لكن من الأن وصاعدًا سأبذل قصارى جهدي لجعلها الأسعد.
description.en:
This is a heart-pounding love comedy between "Manager Tsuruse'', a female boss who is scary at work but whose hobbies are cute clothes(?!), and "Tsukinawa-kun'', a new male employee who joins the company mid-career!

There is also a FANBOX version, a collection of 0.5 "Naughty" stories: 
[Kowai Onna Joushi ga Nuidara H de Kawaikatta Hanashi - FANBOX 0.5 Matome【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/ef970af6-8357-43bb-9bd1-fe09dba78624/kowai-onna-joushi-ga-nuidara-h-de-kawaikatta-hanashi-fanbox-0-5-matome)
description.es-la: Mi jefa da mucho miedo, pero mientras más hablo con ella deja de hacerlo.

altTitles.ja: 軍靴のバルツァー
Gunka no Baltzer
Gunka no Balzer

altTitles.fr: Baltzar: La guerre dans le sang

description.en:
Glory is won over the roar of cannon fire. Peace exists simply as a time to prepare for the next battle. In a nation with superb military power, Bernd Baltzar advanced quickly through the ranks. However, his career now takes a sudden turn when he is reassigned to being the military advisor in a neighboring allied nation with little military power and a lack of civilian support of firearms. Will Major Baltzar be able to win the hearts and minds of both the soldiers and civilians in this country?  

---

**Retail Links:**  
- [Amazon: French volumes](https://www.amazon.fr/dp/236877890X/)  
- [Kinokuniya: Japanese volumes](https://united-states.kinokuniya.com/bw/9784107723499/)  
- [Korean volumes](http://www.kyobobook.co.kr/product/detailViewKor.laf?mallGb=KOR&ejkGb=KOR&barcode=9791134855451&orderClick=JAj)  
- See retail section below for two further avenues.

The National Intelligence Service field agent, Kim Sijun, disguises himself as a priest to infiltrate a Russian church. There, he meets Anna, a Korean orphan, and their connection blossoms into first love. However, every time he looks into Anna's eyes, a strange sense of déjà vu starts to awaken forgotten memories from his past.

Alongside this innocent first love, the target of the current operation gradually begins to reveal itself beneath the surface.

To stop the illegal arms deals of the Russian mafia and protect Anna, Sijun must confront his past.
description.ko:
러시아 세르지오 성당에 신부로 위장잠입을 하게 된 국정원 현장요원, 한시준.
성당에서 한국인 고아 안나를 만나게 되고, 그 인연은 첫사랑으로 이어진다. 하지만 안나의 눈을 볼 때마다 느껴지는 묘한 기시감은 점점 잊어버린 옛기억을 되살리기 시작한다.
그리고 풋풋한 첫사랑과 별개로, 점점 물밑에서 드러나기 시작한 이번 작전의 타깃.

러시아 마피아의 불법 무기거래를 막고, 안나를 지키기 위해 시준은 이제 과거의 자신을 마주해야 한다.

altTitles.ja: 薪窯のパンドラ

description.en: Eri Hourai, a second-year high school girl, takes over "Pandora" - a bakery specialising in wood fire cooked goods.
description.ja: 祖父のお店を引き継ぎ、黙々とパン職人をしている高校生・蓬莱絵里（ほうらいえり）。ある日、突然お店にやってきたはらぺこ少女・野々宮麦（ののみやむぎ）から「メロンパン20個ください！」と無茶振りをされる。麦との出会いによって、恵理は少しずつ心が開かれていって…？
description.zh: 追随前人，过往足迹，今日的少女，也在进行烘焙

altTitles.ja: ヘルベチカスタンダード
ヘルベチカスタンダード絵

description.en: Helvetica Standard is a random comical short that is self-contained, and generally outside the main story of [Nichijou](https://mangadex.com/manga/188), being a full-color follow-up to the hit manga series. Funny and heartwarming, this two-part series is a humorous look at modern day Japanese design in comic form and a deep-dive into the artistic and creative mind of Arawi Keiichi. Part comic, part diary, part art and design book, Helvetica Standard is a deconstruction of the world of nichijou.

While at the get-together party, Cheng Jiahong recalled getting acquainted with his close friend, Qi Wenrui. Due to his grades being in the last rank and having to repeat the same grade again, it was arranged that Cheng Jiahong be seatmates with the class committee member Qi Wenrui. The two became familiar with each other as they spent their days together. "A life under the pressure of both specialized and literacy classes is very tiring, but, thankfully I'm not alone."

altTitles.ja: ハンター×ハンター

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.fa:
هانتر‌ها، افراد کنجکاوی که به دنبال گنج‌ها، مجرم‌های خطرناک، مکان‌های ناشناخته و اسرارآمیز، جانوران افسانه‌ای و... هستند. البته برای دست یابی به این موقعیت نیاز به مجوزی است که در بین هر صدهزار نفر تنها یک نفر می‌تواند در آزمون آن موفق شود.
این داستان درمورد چهار نوجوانه که در آزمون هانترها با هم روبه‌رو می‌شوند:
گون، پسری که به دنبال پدرش می‌گردد. کیلوا، پسری که می‌خواهد زندگی جدیدی را شروع کند. لئوریو، پسری که قصد دارد پزشک شود و کوراپیکا، پسری که می‌خواهد انتقام قبیله خود‌ را بگیرد.
description.pt: Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.
description.pt-br:
A série conta a história de Gon Freecss, um garoto de 12 anos que pretende se tornar um Hunter, um caçador de tesouros, lugares perdidos e criaturas estranhas.

Contudo, ao contrário da maioria dos Hunters que procuram fama e dinheiro, o herói da história tem uma motivação maior para querer ser um caçador – encontrar seu pai – um dos mais famosos hunters do mundo.

Mas não é qualquer um que pode se tornar um Hunter. Para poder praticar essa reconhecida profissão, é necessário ter uma licença especial – e para tirá-la é preciso passar – e sobreviver – a exames com milhares de inscritos. Uma vez aprovado e com sua licença Hunter em mãos, o caçador passa a ter direito a acessar áreas restritas, informações secretas e consegue acumular facilmente uma grande fortuna de acordo com seus feitos ? incluindo ir atrás de Hunters que usam seus poderes para objetivos escusos.

description.en: Cheongwook and Unho have been living together for three months due to unavoidable circumstances. These two, who have nothing to do with each other, keep fighting over trivial matters. Just when the anger between them builds up and is about to explode, Unho gets caught with his secret by Cheongwook.

altTitles.ja: 終末トレインどこへいく？

altTitles.en: Train to the End of World

altTitles.ja: 束の間の一花

altTitles.vi: Khoảnh khắc bé nhỏ của Ichika

description.en:
In the spring of her second year of high school, Sendawara Ichika was told by her doctor that she had two years left to live. Three years later, now in her second year of university, Ichika spends her days not knowing when the end will come.

One day, by chance, she is reunited with Yurugi Akifumi -- her former philosophy professor, who quit the university. Once in love with Yurugi-sensei, Ichika has her feelings rekindled upon meeting him again, but...

A story of the fleeting love between Ichika, whose life is growing shorter, and a man quietly trying to disappear.
description.vi:
Mùa xuân lớp 11 đó, Sendawara Ichika được chẩn đoán chỉ còn 2 năm để sống. 3 năm sau, khi trở thành sinh viên đại học năm hai, Ichika vẫn tiếp tục sống những ngày tháng hối hả, bận rộn, nhưng lại không bao giờ biết được đâu sẽ là hồi kết.

Mọi thứ đổi thay khi cô gặp Thầy Yurugi Akifumi. Lần đầu tiên, cô có thể cảm thấy mình còn sống như vậy vì điều gì.  Và rồi Thầy Yurugi lại không còn tới trường nữa, Ichika bị bỏ lại với ngàn câu hỏi trong lòng...

Câu chuyện về tình yêu bé nhỏ thoáng qua của một Ichika có cuộc sống ngày càng ngắn ngủi và một người Thầy muốn lặng lẽ biến mất khỏi nhân gian.
description.pt-br:
Na primavera de seu segundo ano do ensino médio, Sendawara Ichika foi informada por seu médico que ela tinha dois anos de vida. Três anos depois, agora em seu segundo ano de universidade, Ichika passa seus dias sem saber quando chegará o fim. 

Um dia, por acaso, ela se reencontra com Yurugi Akifumi – seu ex-professor de filosofia, que deixou a universidade. Uma vez apaixonada por Yurugi-sensei, Ichika reacendeu seus sentimentos ao encontrá-lo novamente, mas… 

Uma história de amor fugaz entre Ichika, cuja vida está ficando cada vez mais curta, e um homem silenciosamente tentando desaparecer.

altTitles.ja: 牧場ＯＬ

description.en: Freshly graduated, urban girl Minami got admitted to an ideal company -- large and famous for food products, located at the center of Tokyo. Everything was going so smoothly until she got assigned to a remote cattle farm in Hokkaido. There she must learn everything of raising cattle from scratch.
description.ja: 都心で働くことに憧れていた南は食品メーカーに就職する。だが配属先は北海道の畜産牧場だった。着いた早々脱走した牛に出会い気絶してしまう。慣れないことに戸惑いながらも真剣に働く仲間たちに南も少しずつ感化されていく。本格畜産牧場ストーリー。

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

altTitles.vi: Bất tử và bất hạnh (Bản màu)

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

altTitles.ja: ストランド

description.en: Four high school classmates, not exactly close friends, share moments that are both fun and irreplaceable, yet tinged with a quiet heartache they don’t even realize. 'It feels like time has stopped.' Youth is both vibrant and muted. These are the daily lives of high schoolers—and the strange twists in between. A story that explores the meaning of a small act of courage in an unconventional coming-of-age drama (Anti-Electric Parade) begins!

altTitles.en: (秋季例大祭2) 地上の夢 (東方Project)

altTitles.th: ลิขิตรักบัลลังก์ต่างโลก

altTitles.ja: 異世界の皇妃

description.en: Crossing over into another world and time after a freak accident, Korean highschool girl Sabina is taken in by a duke of the Crentia kingdom— only to soon be offered up to the ugly old emperor as a concubine. When the king is killed by a mysterious assassin, Sabina must face the poisonous circle of other candidates in a battle for the royal seat. Can she attract the loyalty and affection of the men and women she needs on her side to survive?

title.en: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai

altTitles.ja: つれないほど青くて あざといくらいに赤い

altTitles.vi: Xanh đến nỗi Lạnh Lùng, Đỏ tới mức Xảo Quyệt

description.en: Is this senior... female? Male? Neutral? Demonic? A transfer student suffering from an incurable disease called curiosity meets a mysterious being (human) who is beautiful, cute, cool, and terrifying. The first of a new generation of horror comic authors presents an abyssal love story, a ghost story to peek into and sensuality to you.
description.ru:
Мой сэмпай... Кто же это? Девушка? Парень? Оно? Демон?.. Главный герой — переведенный ученик старшей школы, страдающий неизлечимым чувством любопытства натыкается на красивое, милое, крутое и опасное создание (человека?). С этого момента и начинаются их необычные отношения.

(Source: mangalib)
description.vi: Liệu senpai này là... Nữ giới? Nam giới? Vô giới? Ác quỷ giới?? Một học sinh chuyển trường mắc một căn bệnh vô phương cứu chữa gọi là sự hiếu kì đã gặp phải một tồn tại bí ẩn dưới hình dạng của một con người vô cùng xinh đẹp và dễ thương nhưng cũng rất lạnh lùng và đáng sợ. Một câu chuyện tình yêu nơi vực thẳm, một câu chuyện ma quái đầy gợi cảm, mang đến cho bạn bởi tác giả đứng đầu về một thế hệ mới của truyện kinh dị...!

title.en: Bungo Stray Dogs Gaiden - Ayatsuji Yukito VS. Kyougoku Natsuhiko

altTitles.en: Bungo Stray Dogs: Another Story: Yukito Ayatsuji vs. Natsuhiko Kyogoku

altTitles.ru: Великий из бродячих псов: Аяцудзи Юкито против Кёгоку Нацухико

altTitles.ja: 文豪ストレイドッグス外伝 綾辻行人VS.京極夏彦

altTitles.uk: Літературні генії - бродячі пси: Гайден інша історія

description.en: Known for his biting wit and rapid-fire brain cells, Yukito Ayatsuji is a detective and top-ranked skill user who possesses the ability to expose any crime. When a request to investigate a puzzling murder incident hits his desk, Ayatsuji must team up with Mizuki Tsujimura, a spunky agent sent from the Special Division, to tackle the case. Can the unlikely duo get to the bottom of this mystery?!
description.ru: Аяцудзи Юкито, известный как «Детектив-убийца», который вследствие своей опасной способности находится под наблюдением Цудзимуры Мизуки, агента-новичка из Особого отдела по делам одаренных. Аяцудзи просят раскрыть дело об убийстве, однако за кулисами стоит его заклятый враг, Кёгоку Нацухико, который дергает за ниточки...?!

altTitles.ja: ニセカノ(魔法少女まどか☆マギカ)
劇場版モノノ怪 唐傘

description.en: Asa and Kame meet on their first day of serving in the Ooku - and quickly discover that things there are more complicated than they imagined. A strange cult, an unexplained delay in a palace festival, and even samurai in the Ooku are just some of the oddities they encounter. And what does the Medicine Seller, who peddles love potions and mononoke exorcisms, have to do with any of this...?

altTitles.ja: ショーハショーテン！

description.en: The manga centers on a high school student who sends material to programs and a former child actor. The two team up to become an aspiring comedian duo.
description.ja: お笑いのセンスはあれど、人前では緊張してしまう内気な少年・四十万畦道！　かたやネタは作れずとも表現力はピカイチの元天才子役・東片太陽！　生きてきた道も違えば、性格も違う高校1年生の2人だが、目指す目標は唯一つ“お笑いの頂点”!!

altTitles.ja: 着たい服がある

altTitles.en: I show my true colors shining through.
There Are Clothes I Want to Wear

description.en:
University student Mami is seen by everyone as the fashionable cool model-type but she secretly just wants to wear Lolita fashion.  
  
While she tries occasionally to be more cute & less "stylish", she can't overcome the image others have of her. When she watches a new coworker at the cafe she works part-time at leave in a extremely flashy outfit, it sparks the courage in her to express herself more truthfully too!

altTitles.ja: 恋する暴君

description.en: University student Tetsuhiro Morinaga has been in love with his homophobic, violent and tyrannical senpai Souichi Tatsumi for more than four years now. Even though in the previous series, Challengers, he told Souichi how he feels and even managed to get a kiss, he never expected anything more… That is until the long-oppressed Morinaga gets his biggest chance ever. Will his unrequited love finally be returned?

altTitles.ja: 運命の巻戻士

description.en:
The world's most easy-to-understand and hot loop manga!

An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case! The first loop manga in CoroCoro's 45-year history, a must-see!
description.vi: Biệt đội cơ động cảnh sát thời không, hay còn gọi tắt là "Cảnh sát thời gian" (Người tua ngược/Rewinder) là một tổ chức giải cứu những người có cái chết bất đắc kì tử! Họ sử dụng một cỗ máy thời gian ở mắt phải "Retry Eye"! Những cảnh sát thời gian có thể quay ngược thời gian hàng chục, hàng trăm tới hàng nghìn lần cho đến khi phá được vụ án! Bộ truyện từng lập kỷ lục suốt 1 năm liền đứng đầu liên tục trong danh sát truyện yêu thích của tạp chí Corocoro Comic.

altTitles.ja: 美しい彼

description.en:
High schooler at the bottom of the social ladder x Beautiful King of the topmost caste! Nagira Yuu’s big hit series, now a manga!!

Beautiful, aloof, he reigns over the class. Kiyoi has the innate qualities of a king.
At the start of a new term, in the middle of the stifling classroom, Hira, who is silent, friendless, and at the bottom of the class’s social ladder, has his heart captured in a single glance by classmate Kiyoi. Though in this world there should be no chance of them ever interacting with each other, Hira, who is treated as a gofer, suddenly finds himself with Kiyoi’s phone number entered into his phone! A single world from Kiyoi, even the spare change he receives, is precious. These lonely, suffocating feelings, could they be love? A love story interweaving two opposites begins!

title.en: Yume no Shizuku, Kin no Torikago

altTitles.ja: 夢の雫、黄金の鳥籠

altTitles.en: Drops of Dreams, the Golden Birdcage

altTitles.vi: Tàn dư mộng ước, Lồng chim hoàng kim

description.en:
Beginning of 16th century – Alexandra was captured by slave traders from Ukraine during one of their many raids. 
When the traders arrived in Greece to sell the female slaves, a young handsome man named Mateus bought her 
and promised to give her true freedom. 
He hired countless teachers, scholars, and palace ladies to train her into the most perfect woman of her time. 
Mateus's kindness has caused Alexandra to deeply fall in love with him, and she secretly wishes to be his concubine. 
But Mateus has already promised her to his best friend… Suleiman the Great, Emperor of the Ottoman Empire! 
What does freedom mean when you are in another man’s harem and can only look at the one you love from afar? 
Not willing to endure agony, Alexandra promises herself that one day she will free both of them from their bird cages… 
but Mateus is the Grand Vizier, power only second to the Emperor himself. 
So Alexandra must become the most influential concubine in order to have any hope which also means, bearing Suleiman’s son. 
However, Suleiman already has a son by another concubine, and this woman is determined to keep her son as the only prince.  
  
Hence begins the story of a slave to an empress of the greatest empire of all time – 
Alexandra, the woman who would one day be known as Roxelana, Empress of the Ottoman Empire.

altTitles.ja: 電撃！ピカチュウ
電撃ピカチュウ

description.en:
This series is loosely based on the anime: Ash aspires to be a Pokémon Master, and together with the various friends and Pokémon that travel with him, embark on many adventures.  
  
Note: The manga was edited and censored by VIZ in its English release, since its original content was found too "offensive" by the American public and was made more "kid-friendly".

As the monster slayer troops, also known as 'Sretu', no longer functioned as it used to, humans became monster feed.
'Jin Cheongdo', who has been living in a world full of monsters for his entire life, uses a legendary item 'Midwood', to turn back in time, for the sake of killing 'Ian' who was the centerpiece of this whole mess...
description.ko:
괴물처치부대 '스레투'가 사라진 지금. 인간들은 괴물들의 먹이가 되었다.
괴물이 가득한 세상에서 평생을 살아온 '진청도'는
전설의 아이템 '미드우트'를 이용해 과거로 가서
이 사태를 초래한 '이안'을 죽이려 하는데...

altTitles.en: Hey boy! Let's take a break.

altTitles.ja: 少年、ちょっとサボってこ？

description.en: A laid-back OL tempts a middle school boy into taking breaks with her.
description.es: Una relajada chica de oficina invita a un chico de secundaria a pasar el tiempo con ella.
description.pt: É sobre uma escriturária mais velha e relaxada que fica atentando um garoto do ginasial a vadiar por aí com ela.
description.pt-br: É sobre uma mulher solteira empregada tentando um garoto do ensino fundamental a fugir do trabalho com ela...

title.en: Shiotaiou no Sato-san ga Ore ni dake Amai

altTitles.ja: 塩対応の佐藤さんが俺にだけ甘い

altTitles.en: Aren’t You Too Sweet Salt-God Sato-San?
The Salt-God Sato-san is only sweet to me!

altTitles.zh: 冷淡的佐藤同學只對我撒嬌

altTitles.th: คุณซาโต้ยอดนักเมิน เธอหวานใส่ผมแค่คนเดียว

description.en:
Satou-san is the unattainable flower of the class. She is always cold and curt with classmates, but only I know she's actually very cute when she smiles, even if she's not much of a photographer.  
Oshio-kun is friendly and lively, but only I know he works at his family's cafe after school. He does a great job with the cafe's SNS account, and his mischievous smile makes my heart skip a beat!  
Innocent and sweet, but sometimes frustrating, this is a 120%-pure fluffy story about two people falling in love for the first time.
description.ja:
こんなに甘い”両片想い”見たことない！

「佐藤さんは高嶺の花で誰に対しても塩対応。でも、意外と隙だらけだって俺だけが知ってる。写真を撮るのが下手。そのくせドヤ顔しがち。そして、へにゃっと笑う顔がすごく可愛い」

「押尾君は誰に対しても優しい。でも、意外といじわるなところもあるって私だけが知ってる。SNSを使うのが上手。オシャレなカフェの店員さん。そして、悪戯っぽく笑う顔にすごくドキドキする」

――これは内緒だけど、俺（私）はそんな彼女（彼）のことが好きだ。

初々しくて、もどかしい二人の初恋。尊さ＆糖度120％！
description.pt-br:
Satou-san é a flor inatingível da classe.  Ela é sempre fria e ríspida com os colegas de classe, mas só eu sei que ela é realmente muito fofa quando sorri, mesmo que ela não seja muito fotogênica.
  
Oshio-kun é amigável e animado, mas só eu sei que ele trabalha no café de sua família depois da escola.  Ele faz um ótimo trabalho com a conta da internet do café, e seu sorriso malicioso faz meu coração bater mais forte!
  
 Inocente e doce, mas às vezes frustrante, esta é uma história fofa 120% pura sobre duas pessoas se apaixonando pela primeira vez.

title.en: Wolf Falls in Love with Moon

altTitles.ja: オオカミは月に恋をする

altTitles.ja-ro: Ōkami wa tsuki ni koi o suru

description.en: The serialized version of [this one-shot](https://mangadex.org/title/d3caccaa-7ede-415d-ada4-b949ac8b66f5) by Komaki Maria!

title.en: My Furry Harem Is After Me

altTitles.zh-ro: Chong Sheng Zhi Wu Huang Wan Shui

altTitles.en: I am the Crowned King of Hearts
Rebirth: Ten Thousand Sleeping With My Emperor

altTitles.pt-br: Todos os taoístas dizem que meu imperador tem um físico invencível
Meu Harem Peludo Está Atrás de Mim

altTitles.zh-hk: 绝色道侣都说吾皇体质无敌

description.en: Lin Xing, an ordinary 18-year-old guy, is transported into an otherworldly realm in a fantasy novel. There, he awakens an inexhaustible life force within-an “Immortal Infinite Holy Body.” With help from an array of loyal companions-a coquettish phoenix, an innocent ferret, a fierce panda… Lin Xing sets out to uncover the secrets of this mysterious land.
description.pt-br: Lin Xing, um garoto comum de 18 anos, é transportado para um reino sobrenatural em um romance de fantasia. Lá, ele desperta uma força vital inesgotável em um “Corpo Sagrado Imortal Infinito”. Com a ajuda de uma série de companheiros leais — uma fênix coquete, um furão inocente, um panda feroz… Lin Xing parte para descobrir os segredos desta terra misteriosa.

description.en: Do good or go to hell. The conditions of his new curse seem simple enough for once-hopeful hoodlum Jeonji Kim. Or so it seems when his perky guardian angel shows up on his doorstep one day and heals his limp. But will simply going through the motions of helping people be enough to appease a petty god with a grudge?
description.pl: Bądź dobry lub idź do piekła. Warunki jego nowej klątwy wydają się wystarczająco proste dla niegdyś pełnego nadziei chuligana Jeonjiego Kima. A przynajmniej tak się wydaje, gdy pewnego dnia jego żwawy anioł stróż pojawia się na jego progu i leczy jego utykanie. Czy zwykłe pomaganie ludziom wystarczy, aby udobruchać małostkowego boga miejącego urazę?
description.ru:
Ты был легендой — стал никем,
Как старый лев среди шакалов.
Мечты все обратились в тлен,
Погребены среди завалов.

Увидев слабого, толкни,
Пусть и его жизнь станет адом.
Вот только даже в наши дни
Легенды оживают рядом. © RSC
description.pt-br: Faça o bem ou vá para o inferno. As condições de sua nova maldição parecem simples o suficiente para o outrora esperançoso bandido Kim Jeonji. Ou assim parece quando seu animado anjo da guarda aparece em sua porta um dia e o cura. Mas será que simplesmente fazer o que é necessário para ajudar as pessoas será o suficiente para apaziguar um deus mesquinho com rancor?

altTitles.ja: 魔女の空想コスメ

description.en:
Welcome to the “Fantasy Cosmetics” shop where witches create a world full of dreams and magic.

Following a scent trail of flowers lies the “Charme Dresser” cosmetic shop. It is said that it grants wishes of those who visit with the use of “Fantasy Cosmetic” magic…

Drawn by the big hit illustrator meeco, these charming and fantastical cosmetics will make your heart flutter just by looking at them! A full-colour comic and illustration collection featuring short and unique stories of those who visit this store.

Strawberry quartz, Princess Grape extract and love fortune flower buds… adding these last touches to your own “fantasy”, it’s time to prepare your Fantasy Cosmetics.
description.ja:
魔女が生み出す、夢と魔法に満ちた「空想コスメ」ショップへようこそ

花の香りをたどった先にあるコスメショップ「シャルムドレッサー」。
そこには、訪れた人の望みを叶える魔法の「空想コスメ」があるという――

大人気イラストレーターmeecoが描く
見ているだけでときめく魅力的な架空のコスメと、
店に訪れる人たちの個性豊かなエピソードが収録された
オールカラー コミック＆イラスト集。

苺水晶、姫葡萄エキス、恋占いの花つぼみ…
仕上げにあなたの想いが詰まった「空想」を込めて
さあ、空想コスメをつくりましょう。
